TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CGAffineTransform extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: 2D Affine transformation used to convert between coordinate spaces.

remarks.para: An affine transformation uses a matrix to transform poitns between coordinate spaces.
These transformation can be used to rotate, scale, shear and translate points and rectangles from one coordinate system into another.

MemberSignature.Value: public CGAffineTransform (nfloat xx, nfloat yx, nfloat xy, nfloat yy, nfloat x0, nfloat y0);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.nfloat xx, valuetype System.nfloat yx, valuetype System.nfloat xy, valuetype System.nfloat yy, valuetype System.nfloat x0, valuetype System.nfloat y0) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes an affine transformation from the matrix values.

remarks.para: Defines an affine transformation matrix with the following components:
| xx yx 0 |
| xy yy 0 |
| tx ty 1 |
The third column always has the values 0, 0, 1 so only six values need to be provided.

MemberSignature.Value: public static CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform CGAffineTransformInvert (CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform t);

.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/System/Library/Frameworks/CoreGraphics.framework/CoreGraphics" as "CGAffineTransformInvert" winapi)valuetype CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform CGAffineTransformInvert(valuetype CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform t) cil managed

Docs.summary: Inverts the affine transformation matrix.
Docs.returns: If the affine transformation can not be inverted, the same matrix is returned.
Docs.remarks: You can use the inversion matrix to map points in the target coordinate space that had been mapped to the original coordinate space.

MemberSignature.Value: public static CoreGraphics.CGRect CGRectApplyAffineTransform (CoreGraphics.CGRect rect, CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform t);

.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/System/Library/Frameworks/CoreGraphics.framework/CoreGraphics" as "CGRectApplyAffineTransform" winapi)valuetype CoreGraphics.CGRect CGRectApplyAffineTransform(valuetype CoreGraphics.CGRect rect, valuetype CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform t) cil managed

Docs.param: The affine transformation to apply to the points in the rectangle.
Docs.summary: Applies an affine transformation to a rectangle.
Docs.returns: A rectangle whose coordinates have been transformed to the space determined by the affine.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rotate (nfloat angle);
.method public hidebysig instance void Rotate(valuetype System.nfloat angle) cil managed

Docs.summary: Applies a rotation to the affine by the specified angle, in radians.

remarks.para: Modifies the affine in place.
This method is not equivalent to the native CoreGraphics' CGAffineTransformRotate method (in which case use instead).
Developers should note that this instance method, , right-multiplies itself by the rotation transformation that is defined by the .

MemberSignature.Value: public static CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform Rotate (CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform transform, nfloat angle);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform Rotate(valuetype CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform transform, valuetype System.nfloat angle) cil managed

Docs.summary: Applies a rotation to the affine by the specified angle, in radians.

remarks.para: This method is equivalent to the native CoreGraphics' CGAffineTransformRotate method.

Developers should note that this static method, , left-multiplies by the rotation transformation that is defined by the . The multiplication order is, importantly, the reverse of what the developer expects from the instance method, .

.method public hidebysig instance void Scale(valuetype System.nfloat sx, valuetype System.nfloat sy) cil managed

Docs.summary: Modify the affine to scale by the specified magnitudes.

remarks.para: This method modifies the current affine with the requested scaling factors.
This method is not equivalent to the native CoreGraphics' CGAffineTransformScale method (in which case use instead).

Docs.summary: Scales the affine by the specified magnitudes and returns the result.
Docs.remarks: This method is equivalent to the native CoreGraphics' CGAffineTransformScale method.

MemberSignature.Value: public CoreGraphics.CGPoint TransformPoint (CoreGraphics.CGPoint point);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype CoreGraphics.CGPoint TransformPoint(valuetype CoreGraphics.CGPoint point) cil managed

Docs.summary: Transforms the coordinates of the provided point by the affine.
Docs.returns: The point translated to the new coordinate space.

remarks.para: The point defined by x, y is transformed like this:
new_x = xx * x + xy * y + x0;
new_y = yx * x + yy * y + y0;

MemberSignature.Value: public void Translate (nfloat tx, nfloat ty);
.method public hidebysig instance void Translate(valuetype System.nfloat tx, valuetype System.nfloat ty) cil managed

Docs.param: X value to move the transform by.
Y value to move the transform by.
Docs.summary: Translates the affine transform by modifying every X value by the supplied X parameter and every Y value by the supplied Y parameter.

remarks.para: Modifies the affine in place.
This method is not equivalent to the native CoreGraphics' CGAffineTransformTranslate method (in which case use instead).

Docs.remarks: This method is equivalent to the native CoreGraphics' CGAffineTransformTranslate method.
